attributes.action: persuade Stuart Wales not to emigrate to Canada, because his friends will miss him deeply.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who know Stuart realise that his global wanderings will never cease, but...for heaven's sake!...a year away from us, in Canada?  It's all too much.
Please, Stuart, don't leave us......

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
